node.title: One of Australia's last remaining wooden hotels is up for sale
node.alt: An aging wooden building with a tin exterior sits in bush land.
node.description: One of the last slab-sided inns from north Queensland's cart and bull days is for sale. With interest from across the nation, its current owner is searching for a family with a passion for history to take the property over.
node.content:
["One of the last slab-sided inns from north Queensland's cart and bull days is for sale with the owners searching for a family with a passion for history to take it over.", "Herveys Range Heritage Tea Rooms have been perched atop the range west of Townsville since 1865 and still serve customers and tourists keen to step back in time.", "The wooden pioneer cottage erected a year after the coastal town was settled began its commercial life as the Eureka Hotel.", "Current owner Desley Ralph bought the property \"heart over head\" with her husband\u00a0in 2013.", "\"When we took on the place, we already had a connection to it. We were neighbours at the time, we knew what it was like to live on the range,\" she said.", "", "
This image titled Carriers on the Hervey Range is\u00a0set at the site of the Heritage Tea Rooms.(Supplied:\u00a0Heritage Tea Rooms)
", "For years, Mrs Ralph and her family have run the tea rooms, which is also\u00a0a wedding venue in the winter, on the\u00a0eight-hectare property.", "Commercial real estate agent Peter McCann said there was nothing like it on the market.", "\"It's 156 years old. It is history,\" Mr McCann said.", "
Last slab-sided inn
", "History is what sets the Heritage Tea Rooms apart from any other north Queensland business.", "", "
This photo of the Eureka Hotel at Hervey\u00a0Range was taken in the 1940s.(Supplied: Heritage Tea Rooms)
", "Archaeologist Nigel Chang said the property was the last of its kind.", "\"I think it is the oldest standing wooden building, certainly in north Queensland anyway, and it's incredible when you go into the centre of the building, you can see the original structures that were cut and placed in the 18th century,\" Dr Chang said.", "The hotel was established on the Dalrymple or Hervey Range Road which connected the pastoral land and the goldfields on the hinterland.", "", "
The Eureka Hotel was established on a crucial road connecting the goldfields and the port.(Supplied: Heritage Tea Rooms)
", "\"It was an important road, and the Heritage Tea Rooms are the last standing building along that road,\" Dr Chang said.", "\"Really the reason for the establishment of Townsville was to have a port that could connect to the pastures first and later allow materials to get from the hinterland to the coast.\"", "Mrs Ralph is searching for a family who will treat the site with care.", "", "
Desley Ralph\u00a0is searching for a buyer who has a passion for history.(Supplied: Desley Ralph)
", "\"It is not a fire sale. We don't have to sell, we are doing it because our family circumstances have changed.", "\"I'm mindful that it needs a family or someone that is going to come in and carry on the tradition that has been established.\"", "
Interstate interest
", "Mr McCann said there was huge interest in the property.", "\"Initially the enquiries were mainly local,\" he said.", "\"Now we're seeing a lot of enquiries from interstate, I've got calls from Victoria, Tasmania, Northern Territory and everything in between.", "\"We're seeing a large influx of southern owner-occupiers, but also southern investors wanting to park their money up in north Queensland.\"", "Mr McCann said he expected the new owners to continue to run a business from the property.", "\"Everyone who is interested in it is not even entertaining the thought of closing it,\" he said.", "\"It will definitely stay open as the tea rooms \u2014 which everyone knows and loves locally, as well as tourists.", "\"I've also had people looking at, I guess, with visions of these eight hectares there.", "\"Making it a destination for caravan parks or car clubs, mountain bike retreats, health retreats, there's a whole gamut of possibilities there.\"", "The property will be sold by expressions of interest, which close on November 12."]
